title: Garbage collection failed
body:
When responding to agent, the following error started appearing, any advice on how to fix?

ra_aid.ra_aid.database.repositories.human_input_repository - ERROR - Failed to garbage collect human input records: FOREIGN KEY constraint failed
author: myevolve

comments.body:
> When responding to agent, the following error started appearing, any advice on how to fix?
> 
> ra_aid.ra_aid.database.repositories.human_input_repository - ERROR - Failed to garbage collect human input records: FOREIGN KEY constraint failed

You might need to delete your `.ra-aid` dir and start with fresh state.
I removed the .ra-aid and this resolved the issue, however, it was not optimal.

satisfaction_conditions: A solution that resolves the garbage collection error without requiring complete data loss
An explanation of why the foreign key constraint is failing during garbage collection
A targeted fix that addresses only the corrupted data rather than removing all data
